FuncDef: This command specifies fragmented or non-fragmented IP packets as an IP filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to match on all fragmented IP packets. A match will occur for all packets that have either the MF (more fragment) bit set or have the Fragment Offset field of the IP header set to a non-zero value. For IPv6, packet matches if it contains IPv6 Fragmentation Extension Header.

Specifies to match on all non-fragmented IP packets. Non-fragmented IP packets are packets that have the MF bit set to zero and have the Fragment Offset field also set to zero. For IPv6, packet matches if it does not contain IPv6 Fragmentation Extension Header.
